item.description:
Please come down and help out at our Learn to Fly Day Open House. Last year we had over 400 members of the public come down to the airport and check out the activies. 

This is a great opportunity to encourage people to come down to the airport and see all the great things going on there. 

Activies for 2011

 

  • New airplane vendors with airplanes on display
  • Fitchburg based airplanes on display
  • Flight Sim computers
  • FCA Flight instructors on hand
  • Discounted FCA demo rides
  • Food for sale (Burgers, hotdogs, fries)

Setup crew needs to arrive at 7:00am.  Gates are open from 9:00am to 3:00pm.

If you missed last year, check out what you missed.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Learn to Fly Day Open House
